body.name: Maxi-Cosi Pria Max All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, Rear-Facing, from 4-40 pounds; Forward-Facing to 65 pounds; and up to 100 pounds in Booster Mode, Desert Wonder - PureCosi

features: All-in-One convertible car seat: rear-facing, from 4-40 pounds; forward-facing to 65 pounds; and up to 100 pounds in booster mode
Side impact protection technology with GCell protects your child’s head where it’s needed most in a side impact crash
ClipQuik auto-magnetic chest clip gets you on your way quickly
Out-of-the-Way spring assisted harness covers for easy boarding
Flip Away Buckle won’t get in the way while getting in and out of the convertible car seat
body.description: If youre reading this, you know all too well that choosing the right car seat is a tedious, scary, and super important decision. Thankfully, the Pria Max All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, now featuring PureCosi, may just be the only car seat youll ever need. (Unless, that is, yet another little one comes along) All-in-One Seating System Take comfort in knowing your child has a safe and cozy car seat, from birth to 10 years. Children can ride rear-facing, forward-facing and in booster mode. Converting the Pria Max All-in-One Convertible Car Seat to each new stage is simple and intuitive, so you can make quick adjustments. Next Level FeaturesYoull embrace how easy it is to get your child in and out of the seat. Our Out-of-the-Way spring assist harness system keeps straps propped up, which means no more tangled toddler arms. With the ClipQuik one-hand, magnetic chest clip, buckling in and out is struggle-free.Superior SafetyGCell side impact protection is built into the headrest to cushion the impact and protect your child around the head. The QuickFit shoulder harness automatically raises the harness and headrest height to fit your growing child. Its important to have the flexibility to customize your car seat to ensure that you keep safety where you need it.PureCosi and Supreme ComfortWe are committed to caring for precious life, ensuring that only the highest quality materials are used in our products. With PureCosi weve launched new fashions that no longer require fire-retardant chemicals. Carrying the future means protecting your little one, and our planet.Soft-to-touch cushions and premium fabrics and padding are designed to provide supreme comfort for your child. Premium washer-and-dryer-safe fabrics keep kids comfortable and hold up wash after wash. Because they grow up so fast The Pria Max All-in-One Convertible Car Seat is built to

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pria Max All-in-One Convertible Car Seat If you’re reading this, you know all too well that choosing the right car seat is a tedious, scary, and super important decision. Thankfully, the Pria Max All-in-One, now featuring PureCosi, may just be the only car seat you’ll ever need. (Unless, that is, yet another little one comes along…) Take comfort in knowing your child has a safe and cozy car seat, from birth to 10 years. Children can ride rear-facing, forward-facing and in booster mode. Converting to each new stage is simple and intuitive, so you can make quick adjustments. You’ll embrace how easy it is to get your child in and out of the seat. Our Out-of-the-Way spring assist harness system keeps straps propped up, which means no more tangled toddler arms. With the ClipQuik one-hand, magnetic chest clip, buckling in and out is struggle-free.

Safety Where You Need It GCell patented foam absorbs crash energy and protects your child’s head where it’s needed most in a side impact crash. 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat Designed to grow with your child and provides a perfect fit from birth to 10 years (4-100 lbs.) Superior Comfort Soft-to-touch cushions and premium fabrics and padding throughout, provide the most comfort during the journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more tears!!! My baby sleeps in the car!!!
reviews.reviewText: We Love this seat. I was a skeptical because my baby, a year old had not slept on a ride in the car, only cried almost every single minute of the car ride. Now we’ve had this seat a few days shy of a month. Since day one, THE VERY FIRST ride in this seat and she slept in the car, no fussing, not a tear shed. Every single ride since she has fallen asleep, no fussing, just babbling and comfortable…and that’s even with it being a hotttt summer in Minnesota, no air conditioning in the car as it just went out and not an easy fix/needs replacing. Baby is still happy!! And I’m so happy I bought this seat. I bought a color that was a little less expensive in the selection but in the car seat brand selection this one was a little pricier… I am glad I gave it a try as the return window with this company allowed for a good run to see how it performed. We will be keeping this seat and would re-purchase again and again. This is my third child, each child has hated the car. Now I think it was the issue of the sear as the problem and not the actual riding in the car. Also, we are still rear facing so it wasn’t the fact that baby had been turned forward, as to the fix in crying spells. I have two boys and a girl now… they all hated the car. They all have been nursed exclusively and attached to mama so, I thought that had something to do with it but now I feel like the comfort in this Maxi Cosi car seat must be like mama’s arms or even being held in the carrier/similar feel. The straps are just better placement around the shoulder and thigh. The head rest holds well while little one is riding/resting. The magnetic chest clip is superior!! The way the shoulder straps hold up and the way they are formed and how it lays on the collar/chest is way more comfortable for baby. She literally smiles and chats when I say “let’s go on a car ride!” And she happily loads in while I clip the straps in place. It’s really amazing. I don’t leave reviews for products purchased ever but I felt led to do this one with other struggling parents in mind. It really is almost too good to be true but I’ll gladly take it!! Life is better with this seat!! We actually love the blue color too!! Looks so nice and worth the price!!Last note is that it’s an easy seat to put in the car, easy to adjust headrest/back of the seat. Perfect right out of the box!I hope this helps someone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars maxi cosi lover
reviews.reviewText: this is my second maxi cosi and for good reason! i got into an accident and my child was unharmed and secured very well! this car seat is a little bulky but for good reason! the padding is great quality and feels amazing, it's easy to throw the padding in the washer, it cleans well, the buckle is magnetic and easy, great color selection, and the customer service is very empathetic and stellar! all in all this company is great and worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves her new chair. She had the do a before and never slept good while we took a drive. As soon as I switched she started taking naps in the car sit. I am glad I switched her over. It’s also very easy to install and works well if you have two cars and need to switch around

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cadillac of carseats
reviews.reviewText: Well made and super nice aesthetic with matching interior! It’s big but I like that for my 2 year old. Makes it feel more substantial and secure. Easy fasten and release. No more aching fingers lol! Only thing that takes some finagling is finding the right positioning for the between the leg buckles. They protrude a little and can press into your little ones leg. It didn’t seem to bother her too much unless she was cranky. Utilizing the little cushion that goes around the buckle is helpful. Overall, it is extremely comfortable for her and would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, comfortable car seat
reviews.reviewText: Daughter has taken a few road trips in this car seat now and I am very happy with it. She is still rear facing and seems comfortable in it. I love the magnetic latch system across the chest. My only complaint is that the straps are harder to tighten than in most car seats I have used. I end up tightening them by pulling them manually behind the shoulder area of the car seat, then pulling on the strap to pull in the slack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safety and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to replace and upgrade for growing grandson. He loves that now he can actually see out the vehicle’s window and enjoy the scenery. Cup holders are ideal and he seems to be comfy. Will probably eventually purchase another to have in my own vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful. Poor latch. Defective middle button. Don’t waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: AWFUL. NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY. Terrible fit with a latch system that wouldn’t give a secure fit even with the seatbelt reinforcement. It seemed to get looser as we rode. I tried buckling my child in after 2-3 rides, and looked back and the bottom buckle had come undone. Pulled over to correct it and it wouldn’t catch and stay buckled. So so so so unsafe. And not worth the money. Also, I’m pretty sure they are going to pay me to send the seat back to them. The quality in these seats are so far down, and it’s so sad. It used to be a great brand. Will not be purchasing anything else from this brand or company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality product & with improved strap ease
reviews.reviewText: Car seats have come a LONG way since I was a young mom. The Maxi Cosi infant seat impressed me and this Pria convertible seat is also a cut above. I LOVE the straps slightly "pushing forward" or elevated with the cushions on the straps and definitely makes sitting a toddler in the seat and strapping in much easier. Perhaps with wear & tear the straps will lay flatter yet the small cream-colored oval strap "catch" also helps. See pics to understand. I thought they were magnetic when purchasing; however, they just allow the adult to lift & "catch" the strap out of the way for the next entry. The male end of the metal buckle can be tucked above or left to fall below the "catch" yet re-entry is easier if you remember to catch the buckle too instead of needing to fish out from behind the tot. Also, if you push the female end of the buckle down, it will also be more accessible when putting the tot back in the seat. If not, you will fish between the legs of the child for that like all other seats I've used.Lastly, my grandson is long & lean so the easier height adjustment is a bonus. Good luck trying to adjust WITH the child secured though! This was purchased for a grandchild and installed with the mom's help thankfully because we did need to re-feed the straps for a 20 mo old vs a rear-facing infant.

Tengo un vehículo compacto y la silla queda perfecta, no choca con el asiento de adelante estando reclinada y a contramarcha.Fue fácil instalarla, quedó super justa y no presenta movimiento.No tiene ningún olor raro, ni penetrante o desagradable. Llegó en perfectas condiciones.Volvería a comprar otra sin pensarlo
